com.impetus.labs.korus.core
Class KorusRuntime

java.lang.Object
  com.impetus.labs.korus.core.KorusRuntime

public class KorusRuntime
extends java.lang.Object

KorusRuntime is used to initialize Korus Runtime which includes initializing Executers, Schedulers and also managing communication between Processes and Nodes.

send

public static void send(java.lang.String processName,
                        Message message)
Send message to a registered process.

Parameters:
processName - Name of the process by which it is registered in the registeredProcessMap.
message - Message to be passed to the process contains ('KEY','VALUE') pairs.

send

public static void send(java.lang.String processName,
                        Message message,
                        boolean isFirst)
Send message to a registered process.

Parameters:
processName - Name of the process by which it is registered in the registeredProcessMap.
message - Message to be passed to the process contains ('KEY','VALUE') pairs.
isFirst - isFirst to identify the first part of request and give priority over other sub-parts.

                        Message message)
Send message to a process using(processID).

Parameters:
process - process to which message to be sent.
message - Message to be passed to the process contains ('KEY','VALUE') pairs.

send

public static void send(java.lang.String nodeName,
                        java.lang.String processName,
                        Message message)
Method to send the message to remoteNode process to execute the part of the request.

Parameters:
nodeName - to which request to be sent
processName - process name of the remote node to be called
message - Message containing the parameters for the process

sendToErlang

public static void sendToErlang(java.lang.String nodeName,
                                java.lang.String processName,
                                Message message)
Method to send response data to erlangNode

Parameters:
nodeName - The name of the node from which a request to process has been sent to Korus
processName - Name of the process at erlang node which will collect the response
message - Message containing the parameters for the process

send

public static void send(java.lang.String nodeName,
                        java.lang.String processName,
                        RawMessage rawMessage,
                        int port)
Send data to the node.

Parameters:
nodeName - The name of the node from which a request to process has been sent to Korus
processName - Name of the process at erlang node which will collect the response
rawMessage - Message containing the parameters for the process
port - Port to connect with.

getRegisteredProcess

public static BaseProcess getRegisteredProcess(java.lang.String processName)
Get the Process from registeredProcessMap if registered.

Parameters:
processName - Name of the process by which it is registered in the registeredProcessMap.
Returns:
the Process from registeredProcessMap if registered else returns null.

registerProcess

public static void registerProcess(java.lang.String processName,
                                   BaseProcess process)
                            throws ProcessAlreadyExistsException
Register the Process with unique name in the registeredProcessMap.

Parameters:
processName - processName a unique name of the process by which the process to be register in the registeredProcessMap.
process - The process which is to be registered with a unique name.
Throws:
ProcessAlreadyExistsException
